content:
What C# code can be used to filter through a list of laptops and identify the ones that meet the following criteria:
- Has a processor that is at least an Intel Core i5 or equivalent
- Has 8GB of RAM or more
- Has an SSD with at least 256GB of storage
- Has a battery life of at least 8 hours
- Has a screen size of at least 13 inches
- Has either a dedicated graphics card or an integrated graphics card
The list of laptops is stored in a List<Laptop> object, where Laptop is a custom class with properties for processor, RAM, storage, battery life, screen size, and graphics card.
